title: Jordan Clarkson Stunts on the Show!
description:
The guys are joined by walking bucket and emerging fashion powerhouse Jordan Clarkson, to talk getting these fits off, his new deal with Lululemon (Lulu Gang stand up!), a giant water balloon fight in NYC, and of course: the Jazz's wild summer. What was it like inside the locker room last season, and what's it like to watch your team trade two All-NBA Caliber stars? You don't want to miss this. PLUS! We break down the Sarver suspension, Luka's international domination, and we get a follow up voicemail that you absolutely need to hear. Tap in! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
